properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 19th October 2023** The warm space is open to all ages and provides a soup lunch, tea or coffee and a cake.
properties.title: St John's Soup Lunches at the WCC

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 1st November 2023** Stone library has two floors. There is a sofa area downstairs and a table upstairs and down. There is a public toilet with a baby change facility. A reading nook for children. Tables and chairs for little ones to colour in. Coffee and tea will be served Monday-Friday 10.00am-12.00pm & 2.00pm-4.00pm (apart from Wednesdays when we close at 1pm) Contact: 01785 895585 or visit our Instagram page @staffordstonelibraries
properties.title: Stone Library

properties.address: Rising Brook- Church at the Crossing, STONE, Stone ST15 8ER
properties.description: All welcome to drop in to our warm, welcoming space. Hot or cold drinks are provided, option to donate if you can. Join in with chat, games or craft, sit quietly if you prefer.
